channel.title: RadioU's The Worst of The R!OT
channel.itunes:subtitle: The R!OT on RadioU
channel.itunes:author: Obadiah & Nikki
channel.itunes:summary: Obadiah and Nikki carry on (and on and on) every weekday morning. We think it's funny. You should listen.
channel.description: The Worst of The Riot is comprised of segments from the previous week's editions of The Riot.
channel.itunes:keywords: radiou, radio u, riot, the riot, obadiah, obi, nikki
